Boots of the Spider

boots (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 424
unhindered [unhindered]: 75
(mountain-survival [mount], forest-survival [forest], waste-survival [waste], swamp-survival [swamp], winter-move [wintermove])

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

Just like a spider, the wearer of these boots will be able to walk on a web without getting stuck, and will also be protected from nets and from being entangled. These boots will also enable the wearer to traverse all terrain with equal ease.
